name: San Anbreas City Crime Rivals
description:
San Anbreas City Crime Rivals

Are you ready for great criminal adventure? Join San anbreas City crime rivals empire stealing cars, escaping from the police and shooting everything around!
In this game you are gangster - hero, who doesn't afraid anything. In your burg mafia ruling the streets. Savage, aggressive criminals are everywhere.

There is a criminal chaos in the burg.The task in this offense simulator 3D game revolves around shooting and killing your enemies.
San anbreas City crime rivals is an action packed game. When you are driving around in San anbreas you can look on the minimap for missions or you can use the quick buttons to start right away a mission.
You are a gangster, who don't need for glory - you have a greed for revenge. You have a big gun and must to zap as much as possible bandits with guns,

knifes and other weapons.
Are you ready to rescue a people from horrible life among blood, shots, bandits and killers?

It is Combination of all games like fighting, running, racing, task, adventure, terrorist game, stunt, shooting games.

Enjoy this Grand Combo Games in City Auto !! This Game is about Grand thief. Lots of levels & activities of thief in this game like .....

Performance Extra Ordinary levels with difficult challenges in this action fighting games :
- Be a Fighter and fight with citizen & police man
- End your targets and complete your mission.

In this simulator game revolves around backfire and killing your enemies.
Offense Way... Lets get ready to huge game..They Destroy people, rob banks and stores. There is a criminal chaos in the metropolis.
To know more about this game please download this running Game.

New Features of the Game:
- Real Story
- Widescreen Support
- HD Graphics
- Beautiful new graphics
